title: 05/31/2021 - HOUR 2 - Patrick Mahomes Wants to Go Undefeated
itunes:title: 05/31/2021 - HOUR 2 - Patrick Mahomes Wants to Go Undefeated
description:
Colin reacts to Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes saying he wants to go 20-0 next season.

Plus, another edition of ‘Colin Right, Colin Wrong.’



Guest: Ryan McDonough

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
